title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Product Name: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster

- Pack Quantity: 3
- Length per Pack: 30 feet
- Pre-Baited: Yes
- Ready to Use: Yes
- Indoor Use: Yes
- Outdoor Use: Yes
- Scented: Yes
- Color: Green
- Type: Sticky Adhesive Barn Paper Sheet
- Disposable: Yes
- Non-Toxic: Yes
- Effective Duration: Up to one full year
- Coverage Area: 3600 square inches
- Applications: Residential, Commercial, Industrial, Barns, Waste Rooms, Animal Farms
- Usage Conditions: Normal Conditions, Damp Areas, Humid Areas
- Prohibited Areas: Areas where rodenticides and snap traps are undesirable
- Management Approach: Intelligent Pest Management

The Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster is the perfect solution for controlling flying insects in various locations. With a pack quantity of 3 and a length of 30 feet per pack, this glue trap provides extensive coverage. 

It comes pre-baited and is ready to use, making it convenient for immediate application. Whether you need to address an indoor or outdoor infestation, this trap is suitable for both environments. The green color and scented adhesive attract insects effectively.

Made from barn paper sheet, this trap is disposable and non-toxic, ensuring safe usage. Its sticky adhesive formulation is designed to withstand damp areas, humid areas, and normal conditions. The trap remains effective for up to one full year, offering long-lasting pest control.

With a coverage area of 3600 square inches, this trap is suitable for use in residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. However, it should not be used in areas where rodenticides or snap traps are undesirable.

Implementing an intelligent pest management approach, this Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster is a reliable and efficient solution for removing flying insects. Its dimensions of 10 inches in width and 30 feet in length make it an ideal choice for any space.
